description: MCP server for Florentine.ai - Natural language to MongoDB aggregations

environmentVariables.name: FLORENTINE_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Your Florentine.ai API key, get it from https://florentine.ai/dashboard

environmentVariables.name: LLM_SERVICE
environmentVariables.description: The LLM service to use, one of 'openai', 'anthropic', 'google' or 'deepseek' (must only be provided if you did not set it in your Florentine.ai account)

environmentVariables.name: LLM_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Your API key for the LLM service (must only be provided if you did not set it in your Florentine.ai account)

environmentVariables.name: SESSION_ID
environmentVariables.description: Session ID for maintaining server-side context across requests

environmentVariables.name: RETURN_TYPES
environmentVariables.description: Stringified JSON array of return types for the response

environmentVariables.name: REQUIRED_INPUTS
environmentVariables.description: Stringified JSON array of values for required inputs keys

packageArguments.name: --mode
packageArguments.description: The mode to run the MCP server in ('static' or 'dynamic')

packageArguments.name: --debug
packageArguments.description: Set to true to enable debug logging

packageArguments.name: --logpath
packageArguments.description: The path to the log file, must be provided if debug is true
